QuestData.Title: Work Order: Sunreaver Onslaught II
QuestData.Description: Once your scallions are ready to be picked, you'll need only to package them for pick-up.$b$bJust think; your scallions will feed so many hungry soldiers on the front lines!
QuestData.LogDescription: Harvest 8 Ripe Scallion plants and provide 40 Scallions for the Sunreaver Onslaught.
